catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 774
description: green mountain under light orange sky; green, yellow, red rainbow ending on left side of mountain; navy blue horizontal patch along base of mountain; blue lake in foreground, with black reflections along banks

portfolio: From Gleanings of Mt. Fuji (Kobore Fuji 拾遺富士)
title: Lifting Rain
